about.bio: 4th year at UVA pursuing a B.S in Computer Science, B.A in Mathematics, and Minor in Data Science expected by Spring 2026. Passionate about solving problems and learning anything cool.

projects.name: SK-GPT
description: Implemented ChatGPT from scratch using neural networks with custom backpropagation and gradient descent algorithms.

projects.name: Siblings or Dating – Facial Recognition
description: Created MobileNetV2 CNN with transfer learning, classifying Reddit images using PRAW.
Achieved 80% validation accuracy with hyperparameter tuning.

projects.name: Akuna Capital Quant Trading Challenge
description: Built Python-based market making framework using nonlinear optimization and stochastic modeling.
Integrated reinforcement learning for adaptive strategy.

projects.name: Poker Bot
description: Applied Monte Carlo counterfactual regret minimization to solve 2-player Kuhn Poker.

projects.name: TenantTalk
description: Web app for rating landlords; followed Scrum with weekly meetings and sprint planning.

projects.name: Coccidiosis Classification
description: CNN to classify chicken images and detect Coccidiosis using 1000+ labeled images.

projects.name: Film Finder
description: Used Python with NumPy, scikit-learn, Pickle, and TMDB API to recommend films.

projects.name: EzCite
description: Built React + Next.js site; used Perplexity LLM and Node.js (discord.js, Puppeteer).
projects.stack: React, Next.js, Node.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

projects.name: Natural Language Processing Application
description: NER app to extract names, cities, states, countries using Stanford CoreNLP.

projects.name: European Option Pricing
description: Monte Carlo model for pricing vanilla options in C++ using GBM and Box-Muller algorithm.

projects.name: EDO.ai
description: Researching models to predict diabetes based on blood test data.

details: Created an internal PDLC system using Django, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, Typescript, React.
Built a REST API for PDLC registry/lifecycle tracking, benefiting thousands of engineers.
Implemented LLM-based risk categorization using Google Gemini API and notifications using Azure DevOps, Office 365, and Slack APIs.
Built a Spring Boot/Batch solution processing 2M+ data points from Salesforce/SharePoint.
Used Apache Airflow and Kafka for streaming batch pipelines, improving efficiency by 6%.
Leveraged Amazon Bedrock + Titan Text Embeddings for RAG-based semantic search.
Integrated kNN vectors with OpenSearch and prompt engineering with Claude API.
Led interns to develop a REST API; used Jira for sprints; improved project timelines by 20%.
Built secure auth using MERN stack with JWT and Bcrypt (replacing SHA-256).
Configured AWS EC2, S3; containerized with Docker, orchestrated with Kubernetes; tested via GitHub Actions.
